title: Software Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Learning Model Design for Online Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering theories and practical hands-on experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of online engineering education utilizing blended learning models.

Learners can design three or more integrated offline/online educational modules (e.g., GitHub collaboration + in-person workshop) within two weeks and submit development outcomes meeting project evaluation rubrics (goal achievement ≥80%, user feedback incorporation ≥70%).
Learners construct interactive learning environments using digital devices and establish operational strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
